amendment.description: Amendment increases the penalties for crimes of violence against children under age 13.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 10 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to add the provisions of "Matthew's Law" increases the penalties for crimes of violence against children under age 13.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 401 - 27 (Roll no. 214).
